body_html:
if anyone faced the same problem,my step might help you.
as i was facing the same error,so what i did
changed this line
dependencies {
compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.2.0-preview'
}
to
dependencies {
compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.6.0'
}
since i'm using tensorflow 1.6.0
then i was getting deprecated warning about compile ,so therefore i changed it to "implementation"
therefore now it look like this

dependencies {
implementation 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.6.0'
}
but then as soon i run my app i faced another problem which was
"Execution failed for task ':transformDexArchiveWithExternalLibsDexMergerForDebug'. > com.android.builder.dexing.DexArchiveMergerException: Unable to merge dex"

so,what i did i went to build options ,choose clean project ,then after cleaning was performed by Android Studio,
i clicked on rebuild project,

then i clicked on run, and then app started running fine with no crashing

i hope it helps ,anyone who faced the problem like me,here the proof of my result

body:
if anyone faced the same problem,my step might help you.
as i was facing the same error,so what i did
changed this line
dependencies {
compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.2.0-preview'
}
to
dependencies {
compile 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.6.0'
}
since i'm using tensorflow 1.6.0
then i was getting deprecated warning about compile ,so therefore i changed it to "implementation"
therefore now it look like this

dependencies {
implementation 'org.tensorflow:tensorflow-android:1.6.0'
}
but then as soon i run my app i faced another problem which was
"Execution failed for task ':transformDexArchiveWithExternalLibsDexMergerForDebug'. > com.android.builder.dexing.DexArchiveMergerException: Unable to merge dex"

so,what i did i went to build options ,choose clean project ,then after cleaning was performed by Android Studio,
i clicked on rebuild project,

then i clicked on run, and then app started running fine with no crashing

i hope it helps ,anyone who faced the problem like me,here the proof of my result
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26957301/37251484-f6c55a80-2536-11e8-90a2-f11b862a6729.png)
